briefdescription.para: Display pixel formats.

detaileddescription.para: In case a pixel format consists out of multiple bytes the byte order is big endian.
If selected, one octet represents 8 pixels ordered vertically, otherwise ordered horizontally.
If selected, the MSB represents the first pixel, otherwise MSB represents the last pixel.
Screen has two alternating ram buffers
Screen has x alignment constrained to width.

briefdescription.para: Enumeration with possible display orientation.
Callback API to turn on display blanking See display_blanking_on() for argument description.
Callback API to turn off display blanking See display_blanking_off() for argument description.

memberdef.argsstring: )(const struct device *dev, const uint16_t x, const uint16_t y, const struct display_buffer_descriptor *desc, const void *buf)

briefdescription.para: Callback API for reading data from the display See display_read() for argument description.
Callback API to get framebuffer pointer See display_get_framebuffer() for argument description.
Callback API to set display brightness See display_set_brightness() for argument description.
Callback API to set display contrast See display_set_contrast() for argument description.
Callback API to get display capabilities See display_get_capabilities() for argument description.

memberdef.argsstring: )(const struct device *dev, const enum display_pixel_format pixel_format)

briefdescription.para: Callback API to set orientation used by the display See display_set_orientation() for argument description.

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct device *dev, const uint16_t x, const uint16_t y, const struct display_buffer_descriptor *desc, const void *buf)
memberdef.name: display_write

briefdescription.para: Write data to display.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to device structure
x Coordinate of the upper left corner where to write the buffer
y Coordinate of the upper left corner where to write the buffer
Pointer to a structure describing the buffer layout
Pointer to buffer array
on success else negative errno code.

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct device *dev, const uint16_t x, const uint16_t y, const struct display_buffer_descriptor *desc, void *buf)
memberdef.name: display_read

briefdescription.para: Read data from display.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to device structure
x Coordinate of the upper left corner where to read from
y Coordinate of the upper left corner where to read from
Pointer to a structure describing the buffer layout
Pointer to buffer array
on success else negative errno code.

briefdescription.para: Get pointer to framebuffer for direct access.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to device structure
to frame buffer or NULL if direct framebuffer access is not supported

briefdescription.para: Turn display blanking on.

detaileddescription.para: This function blanks the complete display. The content of the frame buffer will be retained while blanking is enabled and the frame buffer will be accessible for read and write operations.
In case backlight control is supported by the driver the backlight is turned off. The backlight configuration is retained and accessible for configuration.
In case the driver supports display blanking the initial state of the driver would be the same as if this function was called.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to device structure
on success else negative errno code.

briefdescription.para: Turn display blanking off.

detaileddescription.para: Restore the frame buffer content to the display. In case backlight control is supported by the driver the backlight configuration is restored.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to device structure
on success else negative errno code.

briefdescription.para: Set the brightness of the display.

detaileddescription.para: Set the brightness of the display in steps of 1/256, where 255 is full brightness and 0 is minimal.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to device structure
Brightness in steps of 1/256
on success else negative errno code.

briefdescription.para: Set the contrast of the display.

detaileddescription.para: Set the contrast of the display in steps of 1/256, where 255 is maximum difference and 0 is minimal.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to device structure
Contrast in steps of 1/256
on success else negative errno code.

briefdescription.para: Get display capabilities.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to device structure
Pointer to capabilities structure to populate

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct device *dev, const enum display_pixel_format pixel_format)
memberdef.name: display_set_pixel_format

briefdescription.para: Set pixel format used by the display.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to device structure
Pixel format to be used by display
on success else negative errno code.

briefdescription.para: Set display orientation.

Orientation to be used by display
on success else negative errno code.

briefdescription.para: Public API for display drivers and applications.
